@legalpimp
Before you go calling people 'idiots', which I am surprised you can spell, I suggest you check your info, spastic. 

Usage of piratebay is in fact NOT ILLEGAL anywhere in the United States. If it were, it would be a blocked IP, same as it is in countries where it is illegal.

Perhaps you ought to familiarize yourself with Swedish law and the passage of bills relating to P2P sharing in the USA before passing comments that suggest your mother is also your sister. 

Remember, folks, when we all come here to find a movie we want: it was a@sholes like this who ruined it for everyone else.

@andrel1
He never said anything about TPB being illegal in the US - it is in fact quite legal.  Forks are legal all over the US too.  But if you run around stabbing people with forks, that's not.  See how that works?  Stealing copyrighted material by otherwise legal means is quite illegal in the good ole USA, and probably where you live too.
